metadata.title: CVE-2019-13678 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect data validation in downloads in Google Chrome prior to77.0.3865.75 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
